statements: SELECT * FROM PlayerInjuryHistory WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_id, injury_date FROM PlayerInjuryHistory ORDER BY injury_date DESC
SELECT injury_type FROM PlayerInjuryHistory WHERE recovery_progress > 0.5
SELECT player_id, recovery_progress FROM PlayerInjuryHistory WHERE injury_type = 'Sprain' ORDER BY recovery_start_date
SELECT COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM PlayerInjuryHistory
SELECT * FROM PlayerInjuryHistory WHERE recovery_progress > 0.5;
SELECT player_id, injury_type FROM PlayerInjuryHistory WHERE injury_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT injury_type, COUNT(*) AS total_injuries FROM PlayerInjuryHistory GROUP BY injury_type ORDER BY total_injuries DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(recovery_progress) AS total_progress FROM PlayerInjuryHistory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_progress > 3.0;
SELECT * FROM PlayerInjuryHistory ORDER BY recovery_start_date DESC, injury_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_injury_history;
SELECT player_id, injury_date, injury_type FROM player_injury_history WHERE recovery_status = 'Recovered';
SELECT recovery_date, recovery_notes FROM recovery_progress ORDER BY recovery_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, recovery_notes FROM recovery_progress WHERE recovery_notes LIKE '%progress%' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, injury_date, recovery_status FROM player_injury_history WHERE recovery_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY injury_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_injury_history ORDER BY injury_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, injury_date, recovery_status FROM player_injury_history WHERE recovery_status='In Progress';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_injuries FROM player_injury_history GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT p.player_id, r.recovery_date, r.recovery_notes FROM player_injury_history p JOIN recovery_progress r ON p.player_id = r.player_id WHERE p.injury_type = 'Sprain';
SELECT p.player_id, p.injury_date, r.recovery_notes FROM player_injury_history p LEFT JOIN recovery_progress r ON p.player_id = r.player_id WHERE r.recovery_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM player_injury_history WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, injury_type FROM player_injury_history WHERE injury_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM team_information WHERE team_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM recovery_progress WHERE player_id = 3 ORDER BY recovery_date DESC;
SELECT recovery_notes FROM recovery_progress WHERE recovery_id = 101;
SELECT player_id, injury_type FROM player_injury_history WHERE recovery_status = 'In Recovery';
SELECT recovery_id, recovery_date, recovery_notes FROM recovery_progress ORDER BY recovery_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, team_location FROM team_information WHERE team_location = 'New York';
SELECT player_id, injury_type, injury_date FROM player_injury_history WHERE injury_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM team_information ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Player;
SELECT player_name, team_id FROM Player WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Recovery WHERE recovery_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM Player JOIN Team ON Player.team_id = Team.team_id;
SELECT player_id, injury_description FROM Injury ORDER BY injury_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Player WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, team_id FROM Player WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT player_name, injury_description FROM Player JOIN Injury ON Player.player_id = Injury.player_id;
SELECT team_name, player_name FROM Player JOIN Team ON Player.team_id = Team.team_id;
SELECT player_name, recovery_status FROM Player JOIN Recovery ON Player.player_id = Recovery.injury_id;
SELECT * FROM player_injury_history
SELECT player_id, injury_type FROM player_injury_history
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM player_profile
SELECT team_name, city FROM team
SELECT game_id, game_date, location FROM game_schedule
SELECT * FROM player_injury_history;
SELECT player_id, injury_date, injury_type FROM player_injury_history ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, injury_date, recovery_status FROM player_injury_history WHERE recovery_status IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM team WHERE city='Los Angeles';
SELECT player_id, first_name, last_name, position FROM player_profile WHERE position='Forward';
